description:
Go to https://brilliant.org/coldfusion for 30-day free trial + 20% off!

Car companies are spying on unsuspecting drivers, secretly selling their personal information to data brokers and insurance companies.
In this episode, we're taking a look at how they do it.

ColdFusion Podcast: 
https://www.youtube.com/@ThroughTheWeb

title: Car Companies Are Selling Your Personal Data For Profit
